## Collections.IReadOnlyValidatingConvertingCollector interface

A read-only interface exposing non-mutating methods of a [ValidatingConvertingCollector](./ts-utils.collections.validatingconvertingcollector.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IReadOnlyValidatingConvertingCollector<TKEY extends string = string, TINDEX extends number = number, TITEM extends ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX> = ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX>> extends IReadOnlyValidatingResultMap<TKEY, TITEM> 
```
**Extends:** [IReadOnlyValidatingResultMap](./ts-utils.collections.ireadonlyvalidatingresultmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;TKEY, TITEM&gt;
